## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case

Describe the problem this feature would solve or the benefit it would provide.

**Example scenario**: "As a [type of user], I want to [action] so that [benefit]."

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you envision this feature working. Include:
- UI changes (if applicable)
- Workflow changes
- New settings or configuration options
- Integration points with existing features

## Alternatives Considered

Are there alternative approaches that could achieve the same goal? What are the trade-offs?

## Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, mockups, or examples about the feature request here.

## Implementation Notes

If you have technical suggestions for how to implement this feature, share them here:
- Which modules would need changes?
- New dependencies required?
- API changes needed?

## Priority

How important is this feature to you?
- [ ] Nice to have
- [ ] Would be helpful
- [ ] Very important
- [ ] Critical

## Willingness to Contribute

- [ ] I'd be willing to implement this feature myself with guidance
